detail.Description: Launching a new EC2 instance.  Status Reason: snapshotId can only be modified on EBS devices. Launching EC2 instance failed.
detail.Cause: At 2016-05-21T16:43:20Z a user request created an AutoScalingGroup changing the desired capacity from 0 to 3.  At 2016-05-21T16:43:32Z an instance was started in response to a difference between desired and actual capacity, increasing the capacity from 0 to 3.
detail.StatusMessage: snapshotId can only be modified on EBS devices. Launching EC2 instance failed.
